node.doctext:
[% my @motto = ( "So deep it's picked up on radios in tunnels.", "We are king killer.", "This show's so good, we're thinking about not even airing it." ); "$motto[int(rand(@motto))]" %]

These are our trophies:
• [The Billy Barty Funeral Party] • [Bad Touch] • [Tools] • [Dead of Fever, Buried in the Fevered Sea]
node.title: Corinthians
